data.title: Hostinger - Bring Your Idea Online With a Website
data.description: Choose Hostinger and make the perfect site. From Shared Hosting and Domains to VPS and Cloud plans. We have all you need for online success.

Your online success starts here
-------------------------------

Choose from a wide variety of products and services to grow your idea online.

Recommended

Create a website

Hosting

Domains & email

Hostinger Horizons

Turn your idea into reality
---------------------------

Build and launch web apps, tools, and software in minutes – without writing any code.

[Start now](https://www.hostinger.com/horizons)

![Image 6: Turn your idea into reality](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/1d4b57f9-a48d-43cb-5242-6c3aafe88b00/public)

FREE WEBSITE MIGRATION

Web hosting
-----------

Get unmatched website performance, high-speed hosting and security you can trust. Your growth is our goal.

[Start and scale](https://www.hostinger.com/web-hosting)

![Image 7: Web hosting](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/aca5677b-a56b-49da-8d0e-fbe591f96f00/public)

[Find a domain that will help your business stand out ---------------------------------------------------- ![Image 8: Find a domain that will help your business stand out](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/183f455e-ff22-4124-ec61-a8f8abf21300/public)](https://www.hostinger.com/domain-name-search)

Website migration. Made simple.
-------------------------------

Currently hosting your website elsewhere? Join the 3+ million website owners who enjoy fast, secure and reliable web hosting here at Hostinger. Our expert team will handle everything while your site stays up and running throughout. That’s right – no downtime. No data loss. No problem.

3 simple steps

Simply pick your plan, fill in the migration request form, submit it and then sit back and relax.

Fast and secure

95% of websites are migrated in under 20 minutes. The other 5% are quicker than the industry average. And, your site stays live the whole time too.

Free

Whether you have 1 website to migrate or 100, migration is free with all of our plans.

[Get started](https://www.hostinger.com/#pricing)

![Image 9: Owen Phillips](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/449aecc1-5257-47c2-21df-a380f8927700/public)

I could **manage** the hosting, domain name, and SSL certificate **in one place**, which was really refreshing.

[Visit website](https://www.hostinger.com/blog/gate-foot-forge)

Owen Phillips

gatefootforge.co.uk

![Image 10: Gabrielle Scarlett](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/0aa01771-e9e9-4105-09c1-b007fa94b100/public)

Migrating to Hostinger was **the best decision** I ever made.

Gabrielle Scarlett

gabriellescarlett.com

![Image 11: Charlie Low and Dale Comely](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/aaa2e62e-becd-457c-a47d-8c96b0575800/public)

We honestly reference **Hostinger as the benchmark** for our engineers when providing support.

[Visit website](https://www.hostinger.com/blog/climbingvan)

Charlie Low and Dale Comely

nohma.com

![Image 12: See everything. Control everything.](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/661ccd94-cd07-4a03-a16a-62e7cfc48b00/public)

EASY TO USE DASHBOARD

See everything. Control everything.
-----------------------------------

Keep an eye on everything that’s important to you, with our easy to use dashboard.

Designed to be easy-to-use for beginners and professionals alike, you can see at a glance how your site is performing and make adjustments, among other things.

Speed. Reliability. Efficiency.
-------------------------------

Enjoy top-notch performance you can rely on and give your website visitors a smooth experience.

Local data centers.  
Around the world.

Wherever you are in the world, your site will automatically connect to the closest data center in our global network. Extra efficiency at no extra cost.

Full speed ahead.  
Whatever the traffic.

Benefit from lower response times and rapid page-loading speeds, no matter how high your site traffic spikes.

Live and kicking.  
24/7.

Day and night your site is working hard. Our 99.9% uptime guarantee means your website is always available.

Total security. Complete confidence.
------------------------------------

Secure your files with regular automatic backups and two-factor authentication

Encrypt your website traffic with unlimited SSL security certificates

Enjoy full protection from DDoS attacks with Cloudflare protected nameservers

[Get started](https://www.hostinger.com/#pricing)

![Image 13: Total security. Complete confidence.](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/10d3524c-8d59-45a8-f7c2-b07611fabf00/public)

Trusted by 3+ million website owners worldwide
----------------------------------------------

![Image 14: Charlie Low](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/ef801bf5-45e4-42dc-c394-c37dafc54e00/public)

Charlie Low

Co-founder of Nohma

Ever since we've been with Hostinger, it's been amazing. We've not really had any issues at all and if we ever do have a question, their customer service is incredible.

[Read the full story](https://www.hostinger.com/blog/climbingvan)

[Read more stories](https://www.hostinger.com/blog/client-stories)

Here to help 24/7
-----------------

Access expert support whenever you need it via live chat and email

Our specialists are fluent in 10+ languages so you can be sure communication will be smooth

Spend less time waiting, our speedy support team typically responds in under 2 minutes

![Image 15: Here to help 24/7](https://imagedelivery.net/LqiWLm-3MGbYHtFuUbcBtA/43929794-bf80-4f1b-60ee-309d6a785e00/public)

Save up to 75% on your plan + get a free domain
-----------------------------------------------

Try risk-free. 30-day money-back guarantee.

### We care about your privacy

This website uses cookies that are needed for the site to work properly and to get data on how you interact with it, as well as for marketing purposes. By accepting, you agree to the use of cookies for ads and analytics as described in our [Cookie policy](https://www.hostinger.com/legal/cookie-policy). You can change your cookie settings or use Opt out anytime.
